::Rex::

Rex raises an eyebrow at Battera's outburst. He was not used to bots behaving 
that way, especially not while they were in a fully armed base with a fully 
armed bot standing in front of them. Rex starts walking after Battera.

"Its not hate," he says, "Its that the Predacons break every treaty we ever 
make with them."

He growls silently as he remembers the comrads lost to Predacon attacks and 
backstabings, the sole cause of his hatred of Predacons.
